summary: A comprehensive unit‑test suite that verifies the behavior of a hierarchical context management component, covering creation, comparability, copying, flattening, key presence checks, push/pop via context managers, proper layering, rendering, resolution, upward propagation, default value handling, and update operations.
business_intent: Ensure the reliability and correctness of the context handling library so that applications depending on layered or request‑scoped data storage can operate safely and predictably.
